Banner.BrandingDescription: Where it all begins. Identity. Innovation. Unique
Banner.DevelopmentDescription: Building is important but HOW is just as essential to us.
Banner.PortfolioDescription: Discover projects where strategic design meets impactful results.

LogofolioRockSteady.description1: Rock Steady assists organizations in their digital transformation and implements their requirements.
LogofolioRockSteady.description2: Its mission is to enhance companies existing digital capabilities through website and social media development, e-commerce implementations and digital transformations.
LogofolioRockSteady.description3: Rock Steady brings people, processes, tools and data together in a creative way that helps companies achieve success through continuous improvement.
LogofolioRockSteady.RockSteadyConcept: The logo is bold and playful, a symbol of the company's attitude. It represents its rebellious and innovative character. The accompanying elements (stars) symbolize the digital transformation journey, which aims to connect the past with the future of the companies.

LogofolioInspir.description1: Inspir is an elite performance expert that helps elite athletes and executives in competitive fields tounleash the power of the mind and create the mental toughness needed to perform at their best.
LogofolioInspir.description2: It provides an innovative and efficient solution for associations, and responds to all requests: help, advice and support to athletes, teams or organizations.
LogofolioInspir.InspirConcept: “The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be ignited.”, Plutarch, ancient Greece.

LogofolioDiversity.description1: Diversity Employment helps companies in the Nelson/Tasman region recruit to retain employees in hard-to-fill short-skill occupations.
LogofolioDiversity.description2: Recruitment for retention combines the process of carefully selecting an individual to obtain a lasting and satisfying relationship with the employee.
LogofolioDiversity.DiversityConcept: Rope, conexion, abstract monogram “D E”. The construction of the brand was generated from the circle, one of the most flexible and meaningful geometric shapes.
LogofolioDiversity.DiversityConcept2: In this case, both semicircles joined by an inner circle seek to reflect the aim of the company, which is to intermediate between the employer and the immigrant. Its circular shape makes it emotionally more positive and close, other values that conveys are: movement, globality, protection, reliability.

LogofolioLumina.description1: Lumina Technologies is a cutting-edge start-up specializing in advanced chemistry to drive innovation in the OLED market.
LogofolioLumina.description2: Lumina Technologies drive AR/VR and display technology to enhance customer experience.
LogofolioLumina.Concept: The Lumina Technologies logo is a visual representation of precision, innovation and seamless integration, key attributes of the brand's patented technology.
LogofolioLumina.Concept2: The mark features layered translucent geometricshapes that subtly evoke the ultra-thin, multi-layeredstructure of displays with this technology. The designstrikes a perfect balance between structure and fluidity.

LogofolioDestinoSalta.description1: Destino Salta is a temporary rental project that seeks to offer a unique lodging experience in the city of Salta, the Northwest of Argentina, in a simple and reliable way.
LogofolioDestinoSalta.Concept: Destino Salta is a brand that honors the cultural and scenic richness of the province of Salta. The logo seeks to capture its essence, its earthy colors evoke the regional chromatic palette, highlighting the burgundy tone of the Salta poncho as the primary color.
LogofolioDestinoSalta.Concept2: Recognized elements of the local flora and fauna were chosen for the design to convey the concept of the province's vast biodiversity. Salta's landscape is one of its most famous attributes and that is why thousands of tourists visit it every year.

WebDevelopment.title: Web Development
WebDevelopment.description1: Start Strong. The success of any project begins with careful planning. Together we will define clear objectives, create a detailed plan, and establish a robust foundations.
WebDevelopment.description2: Ensuring your technical infrastructure is strong and properly set up is our top priority. We take every measure to create a resilient and seamlessly functioning foundation for your project, so you can focus on achieving your goals with confidence.
WebDevelopment.description3: We meticulously construct your website based on a well-crafted strategy and an intentional design. Our approach ensures that every element aligns with your vision and goals, resulting in a powerful online presence that stands out.
WebDevelopment.description4: We launch your website and commit to its ongoing functionality and performance. Our dedicated support ensures your site runs smoothly, providing a seamless experience for your users now and in the future.

StrategyAndPlanning.title: Strategy And Planning
StrategyAndPlanning.text1: To Understand the client's business goals, target audience, and requirements.
StrategyAndPlanning.text2: We analyze competitors, industry trends, and best practices.
StrategyAndPlanning.text3: Define the project scope, objectives, timelines, and deliverables
StrategyAndPlanning.text4: Plan the structure and types of content needed for the site.

Hosting.title: Hosting, Domain search and Configuration
Hosting.text1: We Assist clients in selecting and registering a domain name.
Hosting.text2: We recommend and set up appropriate hosting plans based on the site’s needs.
Hosting.text3: Configure servers for optimal performance, security, and reliability.
Hosting.text4: Implement SSL certificates to ensure secure connections
Hosting.text5: Configure DNS settings to link the domain to the hosting server

Development.title: Development and Implementation
Development.text1: Code the visual and interactive parts of the website.
Development.text2: We recommend and set up appropriate hosting plans based on the site’s needs.
Development.text3: Ensure the website is mobile-friendly and looks good on all devices.
Development.text4: Integrate external services like payment gateways, analytics, and CRM systems
Development.text5: Test for bugs, compatibility, performance, and security vulnerabilities.

Launch.title: Launch and Maintenance
Launch.text1: Launch the website on the client’s server or hosting platform.
Launch.text2: Implement on-page SEO practices to enhance search engine visibility.
Launch.text3: Set up tools to monitor site performance and user behavior.
Launch.text4: Apply software updates, security patches, and performance enhancements.
Launch.text5: Implement regular backup solutions to prevent data loss
Launch.text6: Provide training for the client to manage their site and offer ongoing technical support.
